title: A game changer for our team communication
description: Slack has completely revolutionized how our team communicates. The channels feature allows us to keep conversations organized by topic, which is a huge improvement over email chains. The integration with other tools like Jira and Google Drive is seamless.

title: Good features but expensive
description: The features are great, especially the huddles and easy file sharing. However, the pricing for the enterprise plan is a bit steep compared to competitors. It's worth it if you use all the features, but for small teams, it might be overkill.

title: Solid reliability and mobile app
description: I mostly use the mobile app and it's very stable. Notifications are timely and I rarely miss a message. The search functionality could be better, sometimes it's hard to find old files.
